title: Two-step path to shrinking worker bee gonads

title_detail.value: Two-step path to shrinking worker bee gonads

summary: The dramatic difference in gonad size between honey bee queens and their female workers in response to their distinct diets requires the switching on of a specific genetic program, according to a new study. The finding may aid analysis of the interplay of genes and nutrition that drive caste dimorphism in honey bees.
